Currently , alteplase leave dwell inside catheter dialysis treatment dissolve clot restore blood flow catheter . DOC.brief_title: Alteplase Blood Flow Restoration Hemodialysis Catheters
DOC.detailed_description: Central venous catheter commonly use vascular access hemodialysis population . A common complication low / blood flow catheter due clot . These serious situation patient may miss dialysis session suffer significant morbidity . In attempt dissolve clot restore blood flow , thrombolytic frequently instill catheter dialysis session . However , develop new `` push '' protocol advance fresh thrombolytic ( alteplase ) tip catheter order facilitate effective faster removal clot . We hypothesize new `` push '' protocol dissolve clot hemodialysis catheter better faster current dwell method .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults > 18 yr old 2 . Hemodialysis patient 3 . Vascular access permanent catheter 4 . No prior rtPA use catheter previous 21 day 5 . One rtPA instillation per catheter ( i.e . document result 1 rtPA instillation per catheter . Numerous rtPA instillation catheter NOT consider new event , enter study ) 1 . Critically ill patient ICU set . 2 . Contraindications / caution alteplase use include : know hypersensitivity alteplase component ( larginine , phosphoric acid , polysorbate 80 ) , patient know condition associate bleed event ( e.g.intracranial bleed last 4 week , major hemorrhage last 4 week ( Hgb drop 20 g/L ) ) , recent surgery ( < 48 hour ) , recent biopsy ( < 48 hour ) , hemostatic defect include severe hepatic disease , current intracranial / intraspinal neoplasm . 3 . Hemodialysis catheter patient le 14 day .
